text: Ilija Vakić (; 30 July 1932 – 21 November 2023) was a Serbian politician. He was Chairman of the Executive Council of the Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija within SFR Yugoslavia from May 1967 to May 1974. Kosovo op Worldstatesmen He was a member of the League of Communists of Kosovo. He was replaced by Bogoljub Nedeljković. He died on 21 November 2023 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Kosovo
title: Ilija Vakić
